title: START_NETWORKED_PARTICLE_FX_NON_LOOPED_AT_COORD
content:
0xF56B8137DF10135D0x633F8C48// StartNetworkedParticleFxNonLoopedAtCoord
BOOL START_NETWORKED_PARTICLE_FX_NON_LOOPED_AT_COORD(char* effectName, float xPos, float yPos, float zPos, float xRot, float yRot, float zRot, float scale, BOOL xAxis, BOOL yAxis, BOOL zAxis);NOTE: the USE_PARTICLE_FX_ASSET needs to be called before EVERY StartNetworkedParticleFxNonLoopedAtCoord(....) call!List with lots of particle effects: https://vespura.com/fivem/particle-list/Note: Not all particles on this list are for non looped and vice versa, neither are all of them suited/meant to have SetParticleFxNonLoopedColour(....) called on them.NativeDB Added Parameter 12: BOOL p11Old name:  _START_PARTICLE_FX_NON_LOOPED_AT_COORD_2Examples:Lua-- If the PtfxAsset hasn't been loaded yet, you'll need to load it first
if not HasNamedPtfxAssetLoaded("scr_indep_fireworks") then
	RequestNamedPtfxAsset("scr_indep_fireworks")
	while not HasNamedPtfxAssetLoaded("scr_indep_fireworks") do
		Wait(10)
	end
end

local CurrentPlayerCoords = GetEntityCoords(GetPlayerPed(-1))

UseParticleFxAssetNextCall("scr_indep_fireworks") -- Prepare the Particle FX for the next upcomming Particle FX call
SetParticleFxNonLoopedColour(1.0, 0.0, 0.0) -- Setting the color to Red (R, G, B)
StartNetworkedParticleFxNonLoopedAtCoord("scr_indep_firework_burst_spawn", CurrentPlayerCoords, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, false, false, false, false) -- Start the animation itself

RemoveNamedPtfxAsset("scr_indep_fireworks") -- Clean up
codeBlocks:
// StartNetworkedParticleFxNonLoopedAtCoord
BOOL START_NETWORKED_PARTICLE_FX_NON_LOOPED_AT_COORD(char* effectName, float xPos, float yPos, float zPos, float xRot, float yRot, float zRot, float scale, BOOL xAxis, BOOL yAxis, BOOL zAxis);

-- If the PtfxAsset hasn't been loaded yet, you'll need to load it first
if not HasNamedPtfxAssetLoaded("scr_indep_fireworks") then
	RequestNamedPtfxAsset("scr_indep_fireworks")
	while not HasNamedPtfxAssetLoaded("scr_indep_fireworks") do
		Wait(10)
	end
end

local CurrentPlayerCoords = GetEntityCoords(GetPlayerPed(-1))

UseParticleFxAssetNextCall("scr_indep_fireworks") -- Prepare the Particle FX for the next upcomming Particle FX call
SetParticleFxNonLoopedColour(1.0, 0.0, 0.0) -- Setting the color to Red (R, G, B)
StartNetworkedParticleFxNonLoopedAtCoord("scr_indep_firework_burst_spawn", CurrentPlayerCoords, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, false, false, false, false) -- Start the animation itself

RemoveNamedPtfxAsset("scr_indep_fireworks") -- Clean up
